title: Justin Bieber and wife Hailey cut stylish figures in denim as they run errands in Los Angeles
text:
She visited the salon for a late night hair appointment, emerging with bouncy curls.

And one day later, Justin and Hailey Bieber were seen running errands together in Los Angeles.

The married stars both wore equally fashionable looks for their Wednesday afternoon - both rocking denim pieces.

Hailey, 22, flashed her flat midriff in a white crop top with jeans and a motorcycle jacket while Justin, 25, donned an acid washed chambray top with cream bottoms and a red baseball cap.

Fashionable duo: Justin and Hailey Bieber were seen running errands together in Los Angeles on Wednesday afternoon

Justin wore baggy neutral hued sweat bottoms, adding the much sought after Off White X Air Jordan 1 sneakers.

The singer added a white T-shirt with an acid wash jacket that featured blue, white, orange and black hues.

He added a red baseball cap to round out his bold afternoon ensemble.

Meanwhile his wife Hailey opted for low slung light denim boyfriend jeans while hitting the pavement in slip-on black and gold accented shoes.

She sported a trendy motorcycle jacket with her diamond wedding ring, opting for wavy tresses.

Focused: Justin, 25, donned an acid washed chambray top with cream bottoms and a red baseball cap

Looking good: Hailey, 22, flashed her flat midriff in a white crop top with jeans and a motorcycle jacket

Chic: She sported a trendy motorcycle jacket with her diamond wedding ring, opting for wavy tresses

Door-to-door: Their driver literally provided door-to-door service as he picked them up

Retail therapy? Hailey carried a couple of paper bags as she left the building

Incognito: Justin covered his face as he tried to remain incognito while leaving the building

The lovebirds tied the knot in an extravagant wedding in South Carolina on September 30 at the Montage Palmetto Bluff resort in front of 154 guests that included Kendall and Kylie Jenner.

Hailey wore three different custom dresses for her big day.

Her first dress was a stunning custom Off White gown by Virgil Abloh that had long off-the-shoulder sleeves and 'TILL DEATH DO US PART' embroidered on the veil.

Her second dress was a custom Vera Wang number, which she wore with matching white sneakers.

Her final look, look number three, was a custom Ralph & Russo gown with Jimmy Choo heels; she flaunted her toned legs in the halter dress.

Immaculate: Hailey wore three different custom dresses for her big day

Incredible: Her first dress was a stunning custom Off White gown by Virgil Abloh that had long off-the-shoulder sleeves and 'TILL DEATH DO US PART' on the veil

Party: Her second dress was a custom Vera Wang number, which she wore with matching white sneakers

Reception: Her final look, look number three, was a custom Ralph & Russo gown with Jimmy Choo heels; she flaunted her toned legs in the halter dress

Both Justin and his wife's jewelry could be seen in one of Hailey's new pictures from the big day, with Hailey wearing both the Tiffany Soleste 18-carat gold diamond-encrusted band, which is valued at $3,125, and the $2,150 Tiffany Soleste 18-carat gold and diamond V-ring.

The Sorry hitmaker had the simple Tiffany Classic 18-carat gold wedding band ring, which is worth $950.

Hailey wore some other pieces from the high-end jewelers for the wedding, including a pair of over five carat diamond stud earrings which were valued at $123,000.

Details: Both Justin and his wife's jewelry could be seen in one of Hailey's new pictures from the big day, with Hailey wearing both the Tiffany Soleste 18-carat gold diamond-encrusted band, which is valued at $3,125, and the $2,150 Tiffany Soleste 18-carat gold and diamond V-ring

Wow: The Sorry hitmaker had the simple Tiffany Classic 18-carat gold wedding band ring, which is worth $950

Also seen in the pictures is Justin's new watch, a $50,000 Audemars Piguet Royal Oaks creation which he bought as a 'wedding gift' to himself.

Justin and Hailey, who got their marriage license from a New York City courthouse last year, met in 2009 after her dad Stephen Baldwin introduced them.

They dated for a short time in early 2016 before they parted ways; he went on to date Sofia Richie and briefly reunited with ex girlfriend Selena Gomez.

Justin and Hailey got engaged July 7, 2018 after they rekindled their romance in May 2018.
